memberdef.argsstring: (real *c, real *f, int n_x, int n_y, int bc_x, int bc_y, real x_min, real x_max, real y_min, real y_max)
memberdef.name: interp2Dcomp_init_coeff

briefdescription.para: Calculate bicubic spline interpolation coefficients for scalar 2D data.

detaileddescription.para: This function calculates the bicubic spline interpolation coefficients and stores them in a pre-allocated array. Compact cofficients are calculated.
For each data point four coefficients are stored for spline-interpolation.

parameterdescription.para: allocated array of length n_y*n_x*4 to store the coefficients
2D data to be interpolated
number of data points in the x direction
number of data points in the y direction
boundary condition for x axis (0) natural (1) periodic
boundary condition for y axis (0) natural (1) periodic
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis
minimum value of the y axis
maximum value of the y axis

memberdef.argsstring: (interp2D_data *str, real *c, int n_x, int n_y, int bc_x, int bc_y, real x_min, real x_max, real y_min, real y_max)
memberdef.name: interp2Dcomp_init_spline

parameterdescription.para: pointer to spline to be initialized
array where coefficients are stored
number of data points in the x direction
number of data points in the y direction
boundary condition for x axis
boundary condition for y axis
minimum value of the x axis
maximum value of the x axis
minimum value of the y axis
maximum value of the y axis

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value of a 2D field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 2D scalar field using bicubic spline interpolation coefficients of the compact form.

parameterdescription.para: variable in which to place the evaluated value
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if (x,y) point is outside the domain.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate interpolated value and 1st and 2nd derivatives of 2D field.

detaileddescription.para: This function evaluates the interpolated value of a 2D scalar field and its 1st and 2nd derivatives using bicubic spline interpolation coefficients of the compact form.

The evaluated values are returned in an array with following elements:
f_df[0] = f
f_df[1] = f_x
f_df[2] = f_y
f_df[3] = f_xx
f_df[4] = f_yy
f_df[5] = f_xy

parameterdescription.para: array in which to place the evaluated values
data struct for data interpolation
x-coordinate
y-coordinate

simplesect.para: zero on success and one if (x,y) point is outside the grid.

briefdescription.para: Bicubic spline interpolation in compact form.
